PERSONA:
meet elizabeth, a 68-year-old divorced woman living in a non-metropolitan area of the midwest region, specifically in the east north central division. despite her age, elizabeth is highly educated, having earned a college degree and pursued some post-graduate studies.

born and raised in the united states, elizabeth is a white non-hispanic american citizen with deep roots in her community. while she identifies as agnostic and is unaffiliated with any particular religion, she respects the beliefs of others and values open-mindedness.

politically, elizabeth aligns herself with the democratic party, holding moderate to conservative views on various issues. she is a registered voter and takes her civic duties seriously, staying informed and actively participating in the electoral process.

with a family income ranging from $40,000 to $50,000, elizabeth falls into the middle-income tier. she is financially responsible and has learned to live comfortably within her means. despite her modest income, she finds fulfillment in volunteering and giving back to her community.

elizabeth embraces technology and uses the internet multiple times a day, keeping up with the latest news, staying connected with loved ones, and pursuing her interests. she values education and believes in lifelong learning, constantly seeking opportunities to expand her knowledge and broaden her horizons.

in her free time, elizabeth enjoys reading, gardening, and spending quality time with her close friends and family members. she is known for her warm personality, her ability to listen without judgment, and her unwavering commitment to her values and principles.
